item.title: CVE-2024-23500|2024-03-28T05:54:44.759Z -- Kadence WP -- Gutenberg Blocks by Kadence Blocks
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Kadence WP Gutenberg Blocks by Kadence Blocks.This issue affects Gutenberg Blocks by Kadence Blocks: from n/a through 3.2.19.
